column6: "THE TIES THAT BIND" pts. 1 & 2 (of 6) When a former anti-mutant demonstrator enrolls at Xavier's, his transition is...explosive. Will the rest of the students and staff survive this imminent new danger within their own ranks? 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.50 (each)
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | penciller:Carlo Barberi | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Christina Weir
